mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(w.water_usage), 0) AS total_water_usage FROM tb_water w JOIN tb_device d ON w.device_id = d.device_id WHERE d.elder_id = #{elderId} AND w.record_time >= #{date} AND w.record_time < #{date} + INTERVAL '1 day'

SELECT temperature FROM tb_temp WHERE device_id IN ( SELECT device_id FROM tb_device WHERE elder_id = #{elderId} ) AND record_time >= #{date} AND record_time < #{date} + INTERVAL '1 day' ORDER BY record_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT COUNT(h.home_id) AS home_times FROM tb_home h JOIN tb_device d ON h.device_id = d.device_id WHERE d.elder_id = #{elderId} AND h.home_time >= #{date} AND h.home_time < #{date} + INTERVAL '1 day'
SELECT COUNT(h.out_id) AS out_times FROM tb_out h JOIN tb_device d ON h.device_id = d.device_id WHERE d.elder_id = #{elderId} AND h.out_time >= #{date} AND h.out_time < #{date} + INTERVAL '1 day'

SELECT AVG(smog_level) AS avg_smog_level FROM tb_smog WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM tb_device WHERE elder_id = #{elderId}) AND record_time >= #{date} AND record_time < #{date} + INTERVAL '1 day'

SELECT SUM(turn_over_count) AS total_turn_over FROM tb_sleep s JOIN tb_device d ON s.device_id = d.device_id WHERE d.elder_id = #{elderId} AND s.record_date >= #{date} AND s.record_date < #{date} + INTERVAL '1 day'
